text: “ohuma bhūmiya obaṭa vāsasthānayak vaśayen nirmāṇaya kara, (obaṭa yā hæki) mārgayada ehi nirmāṇaya kara, valākuḷen varṣāvada vasinnaṭa salasvannēya” (yayi piḷituru dunha. tavada deviyan pævasuvēya yayi mesē pævasūha: “mā pahaḷa kara tabana ekama ākārayē varṣā) jalaya magin (guṇayenda, rasayenda) vividha vargayē gas væl (pirimi, gæhæṇu) jōḍu jōḍu vaśayen api ikut karannemu”
